declarations.description: A dropdown menu that closes on ESC only has one open at a time
declarations.name: R4Actions

members.name: closeCurrentMenu
members.description: Closes all open r4-action menus on the page

declarations.description:
To use, be sure to pass in the two supabase keys.
Renders an admin dashboard that allows you to combat spam content and more.
https://supabase.com/docs/reference/javascript/admin-api
declarations.name: R4Admin

members.name: properties
members.default: { supabaseUrl: {type: String}, supabaseServiceRoleKey: {type: String}, result: {type: Object}, showAllUsers: {type: Boolean}, }

members.name: createClient
members.description: Creates a Supabase client with full admin rights

members.name: prepareData
members.description: Sets this.result with all the data we want

members.name: deleteUser
members.description: Deletes a Supabase auth.user AND any channels they are associated with

declarations.description: The primary menu for <r4-app>
declarations.name: R4AppMenu

members.name: properties
members.default: { href: {type: String}, path: {type: String, state: true}, }

declarations.description: The primary user menu for <r4-app>
declarations.name: R4AppUserMenu

members.name: properties
members.default: { /* props */ href: {type: String}, channel: {type: Object}, channels: {type: Array}, /* state */ path: {type: String, state: true}, }

declarations.name: R4AuthStatus

declarations.description:
Give it a channel slug and it will..
render the channel avatar and a form to update as well as delete it
declarations.name: AvatarUpdate

members.name: properties
members.default: { // Decides which channel to update. slug: {type: String}, // The image id from Cloudinary. image: {type: String, reflect: true}, }

declarations.description:
Renders a form to upload an image to Cloudinary.
Supports uploading multiple images (but it is disabled)
When the image is uploaded, it triggers an "upload" event with the Cloudinary response.
declarations.name: R4AvatarUpload

members.name: properties
members.default: { tags: {type: String, reflective: true}, loading: {type: Boolean, state: true}, }

declarations.description:
Renders an image in a predefined format for channel avatars.
There are two ways to tell the component what to render
1. Pass in an `image` with the Cloudinary image id
2. Pass in a `slug` with the channel slug. This will cause a network request to happen
declarations.name: R4Avatar

members.name: properties
members.default: { image: {type: String}, slug: {type: String, reflect: true}, size: {type: String, reflect: true}, href: {type: String}, }

declarations.description: Button to follow or unfollow a channel
declarations.name: R4ButtonFollow

members.name: properties
members.default: { /** Whether to render a follow or unfollow state */ following: {type: Boolean}, followerChannel: {type: Object, state: true}, channel: {type: Object, state: true}, }

declarations.description:
Renders a button, to play a channel by slug / track (id)
1. pass in a `slug` (channel) attribute (causes it to fetch)
2. pass in a `track` object, of this channel's track to play
3. pass in a `channel` object to avoid fetching channel
4. pass in a `tracks` array to use as playlist
3. pass in a "label" string to overwrite the button text contents
declarations.name: R4ButtonPlay

members.name: properties
members.default: { label: {type: String}, /* disable if no url to play */ disabled: {type: Boolean}, /* a channel's slug */ slug: {type: String, reflect: true}, /* a track object */ track: {type: Object}, /* or tracks list */ tracks: {type: Array}, /* the channel data object */ channel: {type: Object, state: true}, /* a user search query */ search: {type: String}, /* the filters used by a user */ filters: {type: Array}, playing: {type: Boolean, reflect: true}, }

declarations.description: Renders a linkable preview card for a channel.
declarations.name: R4ChannelCard

members.name: properties
members.default: { /** If true, the card shows all info */ full: {type: Boolean}, href: {type: String}, origin: {type: String}, /** If defined, the card will fetch the channel on load and set it. */ slug: {type: String, reflect: true}, /** A regular R4 channel object */ channel: {type: Object, state: true}, }

declarations.description: Form for creating a new channel
declarations.name: R4ChannelCreate

members.name: errors
members.default: { default: { message: 'Unhandled error', }, 'slug-exists-firebase': { message: 'This slug is already in use by an other channel', field: 'slug', }, 23502: { message: 'Fill out the slug field', field: 'slug' }, 23514: { message: 'The slug needs to be between 3 and 40 characters', field: 'slug', }, 23505: { message: 'The slug is already in use by an other channel', field: 'slug', }, 42501: { message: 'Sign in to create a channel', field: 'slug', }, 'sign-in': { message: 'You need to sign in to create a radio channel', }, }

declarations.description: Form for deleting a channel with confirmation
declarations.name: R4ChannelDelete

members.name: errors
members.default: { 'default': { message: 'Unhandled error', field: null, }, 'confirmation': { message: 'Please confirm deletion', field: 'confirmation', }, 23503: { message: 'You appear to want to delete a channel that still has some tracks. Delete all tracks first.', } }

declarations.description: Form for updating channel information
declarations.name: R4ChannelUpdate

members.name: errors
members.default: { default: { message: 'Unhandled error', }, '22P02': { message: 'invalid input syntax for type uuid', field: 'id', }, 23514: { message: 'The slug needs to be between 5 and 40 characters', field: 'slug', }, 23505: { message: 'The slug needs to be unique amond all channels', field: 'slug', }, 404: { message: 'This channel does not exist', field: 'id', }, }

declarations.description: Channel info for a list or card
declarations.name: R4Channel

members.name: origin
members.description:
Used to make a link to the channel's homepage.
It could point to different URL schemes:
- on root: https://radio.example.org/
- on subpage: https://music.example.org/test-radio-2
- in query parameter: https://example.org/?radio=test-radio-4
To handle all case, we replace the `{{slug}}` token in the string

members.name: id
members.description:
some attributes, that can be used to fetch model data,
and are unique to the channel

members.name: channel
members.description: the model data, when fetched, or set from outside

members.description: Creates a list of commands from the config and store

declarations.description:
This element can be used to render a predefined icon.
Set the `name` attribute and the element will update the `icon` attribute.

members.default: { search: '🔍', map: '🗺️', map_position: '✵', globe: '🌍', dark: '🌘', light: '🌖', play: '▶', player_status: '♫', player_close: 'x', player_dock: '⌃', player_minimize: '⌄', player_fullscreen: '⛶', // ⌆ follow: '☆', unfollow: '★', remove: 'x', }

declarations.name: R4Loading

declarations.name: R4MapPosition

members.default: { /* public */ channel: {type: Object, state: true}, href: {type: String}, /* state */ newLongitude: {type: Number, state: true}, newLatitude: {type: Number, state: true}, mapChannels: {type: Array, state: true}, }

declarations.description: A world map with all radio channels that have coordinates
declarations.name: R4Map

members.name: properties
members.default: { // The slug of a channel to select initially slug: {type: String}, // List of channels with coordinates. channels: {type: Array, state: true}, // The channel that is currently selected on the map. channel: {type: Object, state: true}, // List of channels markers "ol layers" markers: {type: Array, state: true}, // Optional, initial map position longitude: {type: Number}, latitude: {type: Number}, zoom: {type: Number}, // For building the channel origin URL. href: {type: String}, // True when the map has been created. isReady: {type: Boolean, attribute: 'is-ready', reflect: true}, // Syncs the map state to the URL. False by default. url: {type: Boolean, attribute: 'url'}, }

members.name: errors
members.default: { default: { message: 'Unhandled error', }, 'new-password-different': { message: 'New password should be different from the old password', }, 'password-too-short': { message: 'New password should be at least 6 characters', }, 'wrong-pattern': { message: 'Error during password storage. Password seems too complex (maybe too long or the characters used)', }, }

declarations.name: R4Player

members.default: { name: {type: String}, query: {type: String}, image: {type: String}, tracks: {type: Array}, track: {type: String}, slug: {type: String}, href: {type: String}, shuffle: {type: Boolean}, isPlaying: {type: Boolean}, }

members.name: onTrackChanged
members.description: The `detail` prop contains the track as sent from <radio4000-player>

events.name: trackchange
events.description: Fired when track changes, contains track data in detail

declarations.description: Adds all the neccessary things to query the database with search, filters, ordering and pagination.
declarations.name: R4BaseQuery

members.name: properties
members.default: { // pass these down initialQuery: {type: Object}, defaultFilters: {type: Array}, searchParams: {type: Object}, // inside we have query: {type: Object, state: true}, data: {type: Array, state: true}, count: {type: Number, state: true}, }

members.name: browseQuery
members.description:
Essentially this.query + this.defaultFilters
This exists in order to apply query changes that won't appear in the UI.

members.name: fetchData
members.description: Fetches whatever this.browseQuery defines. It will skip fetching if the query has not changed.

members.name: setQuery
members.description: Shortcut when no extra logic is needed. Also updates URL params and reloads data.

members.name: count
members.description: The amount of rows returned by fetchData

members.name: properties
members.default: { store: {type: Object, state: true}, config: {type: Object, state: true}, routes: {type: Array, state: true}, }

declarations.description:
This is the base class for R4ChannelSearch and R4TrackSearch
It actively searches the database on every keypress.
See https://supabase.com/docs/guides/database/full-text-search
declarations.name: R4Search

members.name: properties
members.default: { search: {type: String, reflect: true}, results: {type: Array}, // To construct a link that works where this component is used href: {type: String, reflect: true}, // Only needed for r4-track-search slug: {type: String, reflect: true}, autofocus: {type: Boolean}, }

events.name: query
events.description: Fired on search input, contains search results data in detail

members.name: properties
members.default: { search: {type: String, reflect: true}, results: {type: Array}, // To construct a link that works where this component is used href: {type: String, reflect: true}, // Only needed for r4-track-search slug: {type: String, reflect: true}, autofocus: {type: Boolean}, }

events.name: query
events.description: Fired on search input, contains search results data in detail

members.name: properties
members.default: { search: {type: String, reflect: true}, results: {type: Array}, // To construct a link that works where this component is used href: {type: String, reflect: true}, // Only needed for r4-track-search slug: {type: String, reflect: true}, autofocus: {type: Boolean}, }

events.name: query
events.description: Fired on search input, contains search results data in detail

members.default: { count: {type: Number}, /* supabase query parameters */ table: {type: String, reflect: true}, select: {type: String}, filters: {type: Array, reflect: true}, orderBy: {type: String, attribute: 'order-by', reflect: true}, orderConfig: {type: Object, attribute: 'order-config', reflect: true}, page: {type: Number, reflect: true}, limit: {type: Number, reflect: true}, /* custom parameters that map to the supabase ones */ order: {type: String, reflect: true}, search: {type: String, reflect: true}, }

members.name: properties
members.default: { origin: {type: String}, href: {type: String}, id: {type: String}, track: {type: Object}, channel: {type: Object}, config: {type: Object}, // from r4-app loading: {type: Boolean, reflect: true, state: true}, playing: {type: Boolean, reflect: true}, canEdit: {type: Boolean}, link: {type: Boolean}, /* Used to conditionally render the dialogs only when the menu is open. The value syncs with the menu. Do not set it. */ menuOpen: {type: Boolean, state: true}, }

events.name: r4-play
events.description: Fired when track is played, contains track and channel data in detail

members.default: { value: { type: Number, reflect: true }, min: { type: Number, reflect: true }, max: { type: Number, reflect: true }, showSource: { type: Boolean }, channels: { type: Array, state: true }, selectedChannel: { type: Object, state: true }, }

members.name: setChannels
members.description:
Updates this.channels with ALL channels,
and adds a "frequency" property to each and sorts by it.

events.description: Fired when channel is selected, contains selected channel object in detail

declarations.description:
Renders a <form> to delete the user account, channels and tracks.
You can either pass it the user + userChannels, OR it will fetch them again.
declarations.name: R4UserDelete
